participant_2.background: i have been working since i was sixteen years old. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. my favorite band is aerosmith. my favorite food is mexican food.

content.text: hello, how are you? I am a worker. what do you do?
Hello. I’m fine, thanks. I’m a Brazillian designer living in Rio
cool. I am in construction. what about you? do you have any hobbies?
Sure. Have you heard about Anderson Silva? It’s one of the most famous UFC fighters. I’m a big fan of him.
I have heard of him. what is your favorite food? mine is mexican
Are you kidding! I love Mexican food!
mexican food is my favorite. do you like nascar? I love it
We have same tastes, you see? I also like nascar races
I love nascar. I like it. do you? what kind of food?
Hmm it seems like we are in circles...
I like mexican food. it is my fav food. what is yours?
I love Mexican food. Do you?
I do. it is a mexican food. do you have
have you ever been to a concert?
Sure. My last concert was of DcFC. But I’m still waiting to see Aerosmith, which is my favorite band
I love aerosmith. do you like
